NavigationFilmNearQrCode: You are near a QR Code. Film it to improve your location accuracy.
HelpMenuDescription: Manually select a point of interest where the bot should guide you to.
HelpPoiDescription: Let the bot appear and talk to you.
HelpPlacepoiDescription: Place a new point of interest.
AdminNewProjectName: Please enter the name of your map:
AdminPlacePoiDescription: To place a point of interest (POI), hold your device on the desired position and confirm by clicking the "Place" button.
AdminTakeScreenshot: Take a screenshot of your point of interest.
AdminActivateConfirmation: Are you sure you want activate this map?
AdminActivateError: Unknown error while setting map to active.
AdminDeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this map? This process can't be reversed.
AdminDeletePoiConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this poi? This process can't be reversed.
TrackingNotification: Move your device across the floor.
TrackerInitHint: Please make sure that the area you are aiming at is well lit and does not reflect too much.
